General.Name: Uni Charm Indonesia PT
General.Description: PT Uni-Charm Indonesia Tbk operates in the sanitary napkin industry in Indonesia. It operates through two segments, Diapers and Non Diapers. The company engages in the manufacture and sale of sanitary napkins, feminine care, pet care, panty liners, and baby diapers, as well as personal hygiene products; paper and cotton products, such as cleaning wipes, napkins, and napkins for babies. It also offers non-woven and tissue papers and trading services. PT Uni-Charm Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Uni-Charm Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Unicharm Corporation.
General.Address: Sinarmas MSIG Tower, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12920
